txt.en: '[placeholder], the time has come for us to go on the offensive. Khetsok is the Ordâkhai camp from which they stage their attempts to take control of the Wrackwade. Thus far we have remained on the defensive while we gather strength, but that time is now at an end. We have received reports that many of their company have returned to Eshadûr, leaving Khetsok vulnerable. Girhâzi has ordered an assault on Khetsok while they are weak. Are you with us?'
You have helped the Dumûri assault the Ordâkhai camp of Khetsok. Return with the Dumûri scout to report your success.
There is no twist in this mission.
Girhâzi has decided it is time to go on the offensive and has ordered an assault on the Ordâkhai camp of Khetsok.
'Your mission is to help the Dumûri assault the Ordâkhai camp of Khetsok.'
Your mission is to help the Dumûri by assaulting the Ordâkhai camp of Khetsok.\n\nTalk to Khâdamul when you are ready to enter the fray.
'It is good to have you with us, [placeholder]. Any day we weaken the hold of Ordâkh on Ambarûl is a good day.'
